data.title: cocostudio memory leak
data.body:
cocos2cx version: 3.2
cocostudio version: 1.6
desc:
(1) make a empty ui(just a panel with green color) with studio
(2) add this layout to a scene, and set touchevent.when touch this panel , add the same ui to this layout
(3) when touch the second layout, removeself
(4) result is: when add the second layout, the memory is increasing, but when i move it. the memory doesn't decrease

data.title: Downloader improvements
data.body:
Adds many improvements to Downloader
- curl code decoupled from it. Moved to `CCDownloaderImpl`
- uses less memory: Duplicated data removed. ProgressData merged into DownloadUnit
- faster: no need to allocate many small objects
- code is simpler: threading code is simpler, but as robust as before.
- sync operations are faster since they are not scheduled
- adds tests for `Downloader` in "cpp-tests/Downloader Test"
- and other minor fixes

data.title: compiles on xcode7
data.body: compiles on xcode7

data.title: Collision filtering (physics2d) should be cleaned and improved
data.body:
From what I see on the code, right now there are no collision filtering performed by chipmunk. If you look here:
https://chipmunk-physics.net/release/ChipmunkLatest-Docs/#cpShape-Filtering

You will see the recommended way to perform filtering is to tell chipmunk the CategoryMask via cpShapeFilter. 
Right now the collision filtering is performed after chipmunk has done the physics calculations, and it is expensive.

data.title: Re-implement Editbox on Android platform.
data.body:
This PR fixed issue: 
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/13147

This PR also fixed issue:

https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/9572

For the new EditBox:
1. Added a ResizeLayout for updating layout when soft keyboard is shown.
   This is because some Android devices won't refresh the view and when
   the view is panned, the native EditText will turn black. This is really
   a hack, but it works for many Android devices from 2.3 to 5.0.
   When keyboard is beginning to show, the ResizeLayout's doLayout
   method will be called 24 frames per second. Once the keyboard is closed,
   or the user begins to input, the doLayout method will be disabled.
2. EditText is working in a different UI thread, so all the data
   are passed to GL thread via callbacks in UI thead.
3. It also overrides onKeyDown method in Cocos2dxEditBox.
   When the EditText got the focus, users could press back key to exit
   the game. This behavior is not allowed. We give developer the choice to
   handle back key event manually.
4. It also add `static Rect convertBoundingBoxToScreen(Node* node);` in ui::Helper class to remove redundant code. And this function is very useful for synchronizing native control transform with OpenGL transform.
